name: AUTH_REQUEST_HX
description: This table contains a snapshot of information about an individual authorization request as of a point in time.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the authorization request.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_CNCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The contact type category ID for the authorization request.

columns.name: UM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category ID for the authorization request.

columns.name: CONTACT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the authorization request contact. If this contact is a draft, this column holds the date and time that this draft contact was created. If this contact is published, this column holds the date and time that it was published.

columns.name: HISTORY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user record of the user who created this contact. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The request type category ID for the authorization request.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of when the authorization request contact was edited.

columns.name: FINALIZED_STATUS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) the finalized status was made on the authorizations in this request.

columns.name: SUBMISSION_OVRIDE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the user-override value for the authorization request submission.

columns.name: DECISION_OVRIDE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the user-override value for the authorization request decision.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_REQ_SYS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the system-calculated value of the additional information request.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_REQ_OVRIDE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the user-override value of the additional information request.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_RCPT_SYS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The system-calculated date and time (UTC) of the additional information receipt.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_RCPT_OVRIDE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The user-override date and time (UTC) of the additional information receipt instant.

columns.name: PEER_TO_PEER_OFFER_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) that the peer-to-peer review was offered.

columns.name: PEER_TO_PEER_COMPLETE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) that the peer-to-peer review was completed.

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique ID of the priority of the authorization request.

columns.name: RFL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique ID of the type of the authorization request.

columns.name: SERVICE_REQUESTER_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique ID of the requester of the authorization request.

columns.name: MEM_RESP_GUID
columns.description: A unique key representing the authorized representative associated with the authorization request. This can be used to join to table MEMBER_RESP_PERSON on MEM_RESP_GUID to report on demographic information associated with the authorized representative.

columns.name: REF_BY_IS_CONTRACTED_SYS_YN
columns.description: The system-calculated value of whether the referred by entity is contracted or not.

columns.name: REF_BY_IS_CONTRACTED_OVRIDE_YN
columns.description: The user-override value of whether the referred by entity is contracted or not.

columns.name: REF_TO_IS_CONTRACTED_SYS_YN
columns.description: The system-calculated value of whether the referred to entity is contracted or not.

columns.name: REF_TO_IS_CONTRACTED_OVRIDE_YN
columns.description: The user-override value of whether the referred to entity is contracted or not.

columns.name: MED_DIRECTOR_REVIEW_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether medical director review was performed on this authorization request.

columns.name: MED_DIRECTOR_REVIEW_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who performed medical director review.

columns.name: DENIED_FOR_LACK_OF_MED_NEC_YN
columns.description: Whether the authorization request was denied for lack of medical necessity.

columns.name: PEER_TO_PEER_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique ID of the status of the peer-to-peer review offer.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_EXTENSION_TAKEN_YN
columns.description: Whether an additional information request extension was taken for the authorization request.

columns.name: MANUAL_EXTENSION_DAYS
columns.description: The number of manual extension days taken for the authorization request.

columns.name: SUBMISSION_SYS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the system-calculated value for the authorization request submission instant, based on associated communications with a purpose of Request for Authorization.

columns.name: DECISN_UM_STATUS_CHANGE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: The change source category ID that resulted in the decision status being set for the authorization request.

columns.name: HISTORY_EDIT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: Where the contact (authorization request edit) was created from.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_REQ_EXT_TKN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of when additional information request extension was taken for the authorization request.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_REQ_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who made the additional info request.

columns.name: MED_DIRECTOR_REVIEW_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the medical director review note.

columns.name: MAN_EXT_DAYS_TKN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) of when manual extension days were taken.

columns.name: MAN_EXT_DAYS_TKN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of when manual extension days were taken.

columns.name: MAN_EXT_DAYS_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who has taken the manual extension days.
